name: Fourier Godot Playground
description:
This is the visualization of Fourier's series you can play around with. You can:

  • Customize radius
  • Customize frequency
  • Customize phase displacement
  • Add more circles
  • Observe interesting figures those simple things make

Source code:

https://github.com/GaidamakUA/FourierGodotPlayground

Notes:

  • If you can - please don't use web version. It's buggy.
  • If web version blinks going fullscreen might fix it for you.
  • To customize circle you have to select one at the bottom left.

If you have UI suggestions or know how to make it more user friendly - welcome to comments.
